text: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

text: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
author: Art Buchwald

text: He who has done his best for his own time has lived for all times.
author: Friedrich Schiller

text: You'll live. Only the best get killed.
author: Charles de Gaulle

text: This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst expect the best and take what comes.
author: Hannah Arendt
